definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: The daffodils were in bloom, stirring in the evening breeze.
sentences.chinese: 水仙花開得正盛，在晚風中徐徐擺動。

sentences.english: She is like a narcissus trembling in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 她像一朵在風中顫抖的水仙花。
媽咪喜愛淡黃色的水仙花。

sentences.english: He came into my room to admire the full-blown narcissi.
sentences.chinese: 他到我房間裏來觀賞盛開的水仙花。

sentences.english: This narcissus has already withered due to careless attention.
sentences.chinese: 由於沒有精心照料，這株水仙花已經凋萎了。

sentences.english: The Butterfly did not like the daffodil as his bride.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶不喜歡水仙花做他的新娘。

sentences.english: And the following spring, there is a beautiful daffodil in the place where he dies.
sentences.chinese: 第二年春天，在他死去的地方長出了美麗的水仙花。

sentences.english: The scent of the narcissi was in the air.
sentences.chinese: 空氣中散發著水仙花的香味。

sentences.english: This time, he met a daffodil.
sentences.chinese: 這次，他遇到一朵水仙花。

sentences.english: A few daffodils were already poking up.
sentences.chinese: 有幾棵水仙花已經開始抽芽。

sentences.english: The Butterfly did not like the daffodil as his bride.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶也不喜歡水仙花做他的新娘。

sentences.english: And kiss you and give you seven daffodils.
sentences.chinese: 輕吻你，並且爲你獻上七朵水仙花。
水仙花，青青的草地，繁星滿天。

sentences.english: Daffodils and crocuses bloom in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 水仙花和番紅花在春天開放。

sentences.english: Daffodils. Green meadows. Skies full of stars.
sentences.chinese: 水仙花，青青的草地，繁星滿天。

definition: narcissus/daffodil/legendary aquatic immortal/refers to those buried at sea/person who wanders abroad and does not return
